EmailTemplate.name: 3_25_2015 Turbostack Giveaway.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: First Turbostack Homelab Drawing This Friday With VMTurbo 5.1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=032515> First Turbostack Homelab Drawing This Week With VMTurbo 5.1 Check Out Demand-Driven Control All The Way From The App To The Metal <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=032515> Download the VMTurbo 5.1 Webinar For Your Chance To Win Hi {{lead.First Name:default=VMT Champion}}, 5.1 is one of our biggest releases yet, it extends demand-driven control all the way from the app to the metal. With 5.1 you now have:
- Up or out autoscaling based on real-time application demand, guaranteeing QoS for your Java® Apps. - Full self service scaling for your users without sacrificing application performance. - Complete integration with HP 3PAR and Pure Storage, ensuring your most demanding apps get the resources they need while maximizing the efficient use of your storage infrastructure, preventing over provisioning.
And now the time has come...to celebrate 5.1 we are giving away one of our VMTurboStack Home Labs <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=032515> on March 31st. All you have to do to enter is follow the link below and watch the 5.1 webinar. Its that simple. So what are you waiting for? Learn about 5.1 and register to win a Turbostack Home Lab. Watch Webinar Here! <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=032315> <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=amgh-webinar&utm_content=031115> Downloads <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=amgh-webinar&utm_content=031115> White Papers <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=amgh-webinar&utm_content=031615> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
